content: anyone who makes handmade gifts for christmas knows how stressful it is getting it all done in time so we always appreciate a quick project that is useful & pretty this cowl is really easy and looks beautiful when worn i love how this yarn drapes with this cowl i am posting this pattern for you guys that i wrote for those last minute gifts materials 1 skein of lion brand homespun size n crochet hook size j crochet hook tapestry needle
